duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the application design and engineering execution for SCWO projects.
Develop and track project engineering plans and ensure on-time delivery of all requirements.
Review performance reports and provide feedback on method improvement as necessary.
Contribute to the creation of technical reports including work plans, progress reports, and performance reports.
Collaborate with AxNano collaborators in San Diego, CA and Cary, NC.
Occasional travel to client and collaborator sites will be required (10%).

education_certification.credential: Masters or PhD in relevant engineering discipline preferred (Chemical, Electrical, Mechanical, or Computer Engineering, or relevant degree).
